section.title: Release 21.11 (?, 2021.11/??)
section.para: In addition to numerous new and upgraded packages, this release has the following highlights:

listitem.para: Support is planned until the end of April 2022, handing over to 22.05.
The staticjinja package has been upgraded from 1.0.4 to 2.0.0

The createFindlibDestdir feature of the findlib setup hook has been removed in all ocaml package sets as it broke nix-shell -A. If you still need this, youâ€™ll have to create $OCAMLFIND_DESTDIR manually in preInstall or similar from now on.
